tool_description: An API showing all the latest Climate Change news around the world.
name: Climate Change and News Live
title: Climate Change and News Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about Climate Change from specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-and-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-and-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-and-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-and-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the news about Climate Change from all over the world.
